name: FLu Away
description:
Game made at the global Game Jam 2018

Theme: TRANSMISSION

The base idea was the Flu transmission. In closed public spaces, like the Subway Station, it's very easy the get the Flu.
The mais objective is simple as, catch the train before he leaves the Station.
You have a limited time to do so, but if you get close to the ones infected with the Flu, you become slower and could mis the train. You con take the pill for extra time.

This was the version sent to the GGJ2018, with some bugs solved (but others still remaining, sorry about that).

I'll keep on developing this funny game, stay alert for updates.
